mapper.select: SELECT A_.id, A_.`names`, DATE_FORMAT(oi.best_time,"%Y-%m-%d") time, COUNT(oi.order_id) order_num, COUNT(DISTINCT b1.buyer_id) user_num, SUM(oi.total_amount) money FROM order_info oi LEFT JOIN buyer b1 ON b1.buyer_id = oi.buyer_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(o.best_time,"%Y-%m-%d") time1, a.id, a.area_name names FROM area a LEFT JOIN buyer b ON a.id = b.region_id LEFT JOIN users u ON u.id= b.buyer_id LEFT JOIN order_info o ON b.buyer_id = o.buyer_id WHERE a.id > 2 GROUP BY time1,a.id ORDER BY a.id DESC,time1 DESC)A_ ON A_.id = b1.region_id WHERE oi.trade_status !=2 AND oi.pay_status !=1 AND DATE_FORMAT(oi.best_time,"%Y-%m-%d") = A_.time1 GROUP BY time,A_.id ORDER BY time DESC,A_.id DESC
